title: Generative AI to Agentic AI Workshop
description: The One Week STTP on “Generative to Agentic AI” at RAIT, Nerul, organized by the CSE Department and RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter, concluded after six impactful days of cutting-edge knowledge and hands-on learning.

title: AI Meets Quantum: Expert Talk
description: On the occasion of World Quantum Day, the Computer Science Engineering Department of RAIT, in collaboration with the RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter, hosted a National Level Webinar. The event explored the convergence of Artificial Intelligence and Quantum Computing. It was conducted online on 14th April 2025 at 11:00 AM.

title: Hour Of Code
description: The RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter conducted Hour of Code from December 9 to 13, 2024, at Don Bosco High School, Seawoods, Navi Mumbai. Non-core members taught children about Cyber Security, emphasizing online safety and the role of cyber police.

title: IGNASIA WORKSHOP
description: This comprehensive two-day workshop will guide participants from theory to practice. The first day is dedicated to building a solid foundation in AI and Machine Learning fundamentals. On the second day, attendees will engage in a hands-on session exploring advanced AI tools and their real-world applications. Refreshments will be provided during the event, and every participant will receive a certificate to recognize their completion of the workshop.

title: RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter Launch
description: The RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter was officially launched on September 4, 2024, at Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Nerul. The event featured guest speaker Miss Naina Gupta Bandopadhyay and guest of honor Mr. Ehsan Ahmed Momim.

title: Neural Nexus: AI Bootcamp
description: Neural Nexus: AI Bootcamp was conducted by RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter from February 24th to March 1st, 2025 at Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Nerul. The week-long event featured panel discussions, coding competitions, debates, ideathons, and hands-on workshops.

title: Build Your 1st AI MODEL
description: This two-day workshop is designed to guide participants through the process of learning, creating, and launching their first AI project. Day 1 focuses on building a strong foundation, covering an introduction to Python for AI and the fundamentals of Machine Learning. The second day transitions into a practical, hands-on session where attendees will build their first AI model and receive valuable tips for implementation. Refreshments and certificates are included for all participants upon completion.

title: Harnessing Generative AI
description: The Department of Information Technology, in collaboration with RAIT ACM SIGAI and others, organized a one-day workshop held on 12th April 2025 from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM at SAKEC, Chembur in a hybrid mode, featuring an insightful session by Mr. Nitin Kukreja from NPCI.

title: Winter Internship Program: Generative AI
description: RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter, in collaboration with the CSE Department, conducted a one-month winter internship on Generative AI from December 16, 2024, to January 16, 2025. Participants explored the fundamentals of Generative AI, including VAEs, GANs, and Transformers.

title: KLEOS 3.0: National Level Hackathon
description: RAIT ACM Student Chapter, in collaboration with ACM-W and SIGAI, hosted KLEOS 3.0 – a national-level hackathon held on 19th July 2025 at Dr. D.Y. Patil’s Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Nerul. The event brought together innovation, teamwork, and technical excellence, attracting participation from over 400 teams nationwide.

title: Exploring GeoAI
description: The Department of Computer Science and Engineering at RAIT, in collaboration with Esri India and the RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter, organized a workshop on “Exploring GeoAI: Spatial Intelligence and Research Applications using ArcGIS.” The session was conducted by Dr. Seema Joshi, Vice President, Strategic Initiatives, Esri India.

title: IGNASIA AI v1.0
description: The RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter conducted IGNASIA AI V1.0 on October 19, 2024, at Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Nerul. The workshop featured speakers Mr. Amey Shete and Mr. Dev Nirmal, engaging participants eager to explore AI and Machine Learning.

title: Expert Talk: The Power of GenAI
description: The RAIT ACM SIGAI Chapter hosted a session on The Power of Generative AI in Data Analytics on October 11, 2024. The event featured Mr. Akshay Ridlan, a Data Engineer, Animal Activist, and Founder of projectchetna.in and Pawfriend.in.

title: Eminent Speaker Program on Conversational AI
description: The RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter conducted the Eminent Speaker Program on October 9, 2024, featuring Dr. Karthika Vijayan. The online session focused on Conversational AI, its significance, and real-world applications.

title: KAINOS AI Hackathon 2024
description: The KAINOS AI Hackathon 2024 was a 24-hour online competition focused on healthcare, finance, smart cities, and environmental sustainability. Over 1,300 registrations led to 150 finalists competing on September 26, 2024.

title: MongoDB Essentials Workshop
description: The RAIT ACM SIGAI Student Chapter conducted the MongoDB Essentials Workshop on October 4, 2024, at Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Nerul. The session was led by Dr. Shubhangi N. Ghate and Dr. Dipti Jadhav.

title: Semantix: NLP & Sentiment Analysis Workshop
description: The SemantiX Workshop on NLP and Sentiment Analysis was a two-day hands-on training conducted by the CSE Department in collaboration with RAIT ACM SIGAI. It introduced participants to NLP fundamentals and practical sentiment analysis model development.
